ComicInfo.Title: The Tower - Part Three of the Gathering
ComicInfo.Summary:
Thor and Tommy visit Asgard. Though quite beautiful, it is void of the Gods and instead populated by killer Trolls and unfriendly Frost Giants. Thor tells the story of how this came to happen and surprisingly how the story of Ragnarok really happened. While they are talking, they are ambushed by Trolls and Tommy (in his human form) eats more arrows than a doctor can prescribe. Thor battles the Trolls alone and just when it looks like things are bad...Tommy manages to transform to Monolith and helps out. Monolith then makes it to the seat of Odin and uses its magic powers to scan for other superheroes...and finds there are :many".
Meanwhile back at Earth, Commander Speck yells at General Richter for "stealing" Thor, his superhuman. The argument does not go well and after the incident...Speck ends up in front of a train.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-14 13:30:23. [CVDB34471]
ComicInfo.Characters: Benjamin Franklin Richter, Monolith, Terry Wise, Thor
